title: 16-Color Sticky Note Palette
competitiveRationale: Miro offers 16 sticky note colors. UnityNOTES has 6. This is the simplest competitive gap to close.
objective: Expand the STICKY_COLORS constant in StickyNode.jsx from 6 colors to 16 colors. Update the color picker grid layout from 3-column to 4-column to accommodate the additional colors. All colors must have sufficient contrast for white or dark text readability.

pattern.description: Follow the existing STICKY_COLORS object pattern at lines 15-22 of StickyNode.jsx
pattern.notes: Each color needs bg (light background), border (saturated accent), text (dark readable color). The bg should be a tinted pastel, border should be the pure hue, text should be a dark shade of the same hue family.

acceptanceCriteria: All 6 existing colors (yellow, pink, blue, green, orange, purple) are preserved with identical values
10 new colors added: coral, teal, indigo, lime, rose, amber, cyan, slate, mint, lavender
Color picker grid uses gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(4, 1fr)' instead of 'repeat(3, 1fr)'
Each new color has bg, border, and text properties following the existing pattern
All text colors have minimum 4.5:1 contrast ratio against their bg color (WCAG AA)
